EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-09-26 Presidio Follow Up Email.ES-2018-09-26 Presidio Follow Up Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Token of Our Appreciation from Presidio Exchange – Amazon Gift Cards
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your time at Presidio Exchange 2018 in Orlando, Florida.
As Vinu Thomas mentioned, Turbonomic is one of Presidio’s Strategic Vendors to focus on for our unique ability to capitalize on the cloud journey by helping customers Assess, Migrate and then Optimize their Cloud environment.
Turbonomic’s AI-driven workload automation makes determinations based on actual customer workloads, ensuring applications get the resources they need to run at optimal performance while reducing costs and maintaining compliance.
As a token of our appreciation for the time you spent with us at Presidio Exchange, we would like to extend the following offers:
- Account Managers, Reps & Executives – from now until October 31st, you will receive a $100 Amazon Gift Card for any net new meeting you bring to Turbonomic. If that meeting converts into a Proof-of-Value (POV), you will get an additional $300 Amazon Gift Card. Finally, you can earn an additional $500 (cash) if that opportunity is closed within 6 months of the deal registration and is a net new logo*.
- Contact your Turbonomic Partner Director for additional information on these incentives!
- Technical Pre-Sales/Systems Engineers – if you are the one of the 1st 50 to achieve your Turbonomic Technical Sales Accreditation, you will receive a $100 Amazon Gift Card. This promotion expires October 11, 2018!
- Access our Partner Portal TODAY to take advantage of this offer! To request access, please email partnerdesk@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partnerdesk@turbonomic.com]]>.
We look forward to working with you!
Regards, Turbonomic Channel & Alliances Team
Tracy Paugh Partner Director, West 650-814-2963 Tracy.Paugh@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Tracy.Paugh@turbonomic.com]]>
Rick Razaq Partner Director, TOLA 713-516-1618 Rick.Razaq@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Rick.Razaq@turbonomic.com]]>
Patrick McCreight Partner Director, North Central 224-430-8459 Patrick.Mccreight@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Patrick.Mccreight@turbonomic.com]]>
Veronica Sera Partner Director, NY/NJ 646-771-4507 Veronica.Sera@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Veronica.Sera@turbonomic.com]]>
Dan Charland Partner Director, NorthEast & Pennsylvania 508.314.5117 Dan.Charland@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Dan.Charland@turbonomic.com]]>
Chris Gallamore Partner Director, SouthEast & Federal 678-642-8639 Chris.Gallamore@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:Chris.Gallamore@turbonomic.com]]>
*The $500 Cash Incentive is offered to any Turbonomic new logos that are closed within 6 months of the deal registration date and deal size is minimum of $50,000 in Partner Buy Cost. Turbonomic new logos are defined as a company who has not purchased anything from Turbonomic in the last 2 years and does not have an active user license with us today
